SelectableTileProps.name: onClick
SelectableTileProps.description:
For variant selectable {`() : void`}A function for controlling{' '} selected Tile prop.

For variant interactive. There is no restriction for using it with interactive, but interactive means that there is a button or a link inside tile, so be careful with potential clicks inside clicks. And there is also no hover state for interactive. {`React.MouseEventHandler`} For variant link: {`React.MouseEventHandler`}
